metadata.description: Brooktec's workflow orchestration plugins and agents. Install all plugins together for full workflow support.

plugins.name: frontend-orchestration
plugins.description: Frontend orchestration workflow. REQUIRES: frontend-mobile-development, security-compliance, and git-actions plugins to be installed for complete workflow.

plugins.name: frontend-mobile-development
plugins.description: Frontend UI development and mobile application implementation across platforms

plugins.name: security-compliance
plugins.description: Security auditing, vulnerability assessment, and compliance validation for applications

plugins.name: git-actions
plugins.description: Git operations and pull request management with Redmine integration
